Authors

< Distribution Contents | OpenBinder | Missing Features >

Kenneth Albanowski (kenneth.albanowski@palmsource.com): Port of user-space code to Linux.

Trey Boudreau (trey.boudrea@palmsource.com): Linux Binder module, IMemory, Memory Dealer.

John Dance (dance@acm.org): Marshalling and pidgen, BCatalogMirror.

Dianne Hackborn (hackbod@angryredplanet.com): General design, support classes, SValue, SLocker and SAtom debugging, data model, documentation.

Arve Hjønnevåg (arve.hjonnevag@palmsource.com): Binder kernel module (versions 2 and 4).

George Hoffman (geh@georgeandjulia.com): Initial design and implementation, especially of IBinder/BBinder, the Binder kernel module, gehnaphores (lightweight locks), SAtom, SHandler.

Joe Onorato (joeo@onorato.org): General design, XML parser, BBinder, marshalling and pidgen.

Jason Parks (jason.parks@palmsource.com): Package manager, settings catalog, Binder Shell, data model, port to Linux.

Jenny Tsai (jitsai@alumni.uchicago.edu): Pidgen.
